dialogue.htmlContent: The person turns towards you and says [sonja.speech(The name's Sonja. Nice to meet you!)]

Walking up to [sonja.name], she grunts and gives you a nod. [sonja.speech(Hey)]

You wonder if you should talk to her, or decline and continue on your way...

Walking up to [sonja.name], she glances at you before saying [sonja.speech(Sorry, but I'm a bit busy right now. Talk to me later when I'm off work.)]

She seems a bit preoccupied with work to interact with you at the moment.

[pc.speech(I'm on some important business right now,)] you say, before stepping back and preparing to move off.

[sonja.speech(I understand. Talk to you later!)] Sonja says.

You make a brief, non-committal response, before quickly moving off and continuing on your way.

[pc.speech(That sounds kind of nice...)] you find yourself answering.

[sonja.speech(Well, this is a nice talk)] Sonja says.

[pc.speech(Do you want to fuck me?)] you ask.

Sonja thrusts her hips out. [sonja.speech(Come and get it.)] Sonja says.

[pc.speech(Can I fuck you?)] you ask.

[sonja.speech(Of course.)] Sonja says.

#IF(sonja.isSatisfiedFromLastSex())

Sonja pants for a bit before giving you a toothy grin. [sonja.speech(That was great! You're an awesome fuck [pc.girl].)]

Sonja brings you close to whisper something in your ear. [sonja.speech(We should fuck again, and soon.)] She briefly nibbles on your earlobe before pulling away and you can't help but shudder at the thought of being with her again.

[pc.speech(Of course!)] you reply.

#ELSE

Sonja glares at you and snarls [sonja.speech(That was a waste of time! You couldn't even get me off!)]

You look down and apologetically mutter, [pc.speech(Sorry.)]

#ENDIF

After quickly getting your things back in order, you leave.
